item.title: Help! unusual error!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I did that look closer:

[Quote]Client.java

[Code]

	case 155:
		// first Click npc
		NPCSlot = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
		if ((NPCSlot < 0) || (NPCSlot >= server.npcHandler.npcs.length)
				|| (server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot] == null))
			break;
		NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
		boolean FishingGo = false;
		boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
		if (misc.random(100) == 1) {
			triggerRandom();
			break;
		}
		if (!antiHax())
			break;

if(NPCID == 2253){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 48;
}[/code]

WanneShop Section


			} else if(NPCID == 2253) {
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 48; // Player custom shop 2

[/Quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 16, 2009, 07:02:25 pm[/size][hr]

…it shows up with a blank shop interface…

LOL! I did the code and it shows up with an interface with NO shop title and NO items when it should… WTF???

item.title: Help! unusual error!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

OK guys… I am trying to add a shop ok? Now I added all the coding and stuff ( example listed below) and it shows up with a blank shop interface. wtf!?

Shops.cfg

[code]shop = 48 NEW!_-Player_Customs_Shop_2-_New! 2 2 16023 2147000000

13659 2147000000 13662 2147000000 13660 2147000000 13698 2147000000

13641 2147000000 13665 2147000000
[ENDOFSHOPLIST]
[/code]
Client.java

case 155: // first Click npc NPCSlot = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); if ((NPCSlot < 0) || (NPCSlot >= server.npcHandler.npcs.length) || (server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot] == null)) break; NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; boolean FishingGo = false; boolean PutNPCCoords = false; if (misc.random(100) == 1) { triggerRandom(); break; } if (!antiHax()) break; if(NPCID == 2253){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 48; }
WanneShop Section

} else if(NPCID == 2253) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 48; // Player custom shop 2

That’s how I usually did it and it worked foar all my other shops. Why is it not working now?
Please Help. Thx
-Ghostly

Read full topic
